data.name: Ivan - Universitas Indonesia
data.story: “Being one of the scholars of this prestigious merit-based full scholarship in the first year of university has been the perfect validation for what I’ve managed to achieve in high school. It has undoubtedly jump-started my career and opened up many doors of opportunities for me here in Universitas Indonesia.”

data.name: Jonathan - Institut Teknologi Bandung
data.story: “Since I was in Senior High School, I had a wish to pay my all tuition fee by my own self, but I didn’t know how to get the amount of money at that time. I tried to look for information about some scholarships. After reading all requirements, contracts, the process of selection of some scholarships, I was strongly interested in SEA Scholarships. The process of selection is not complicated like other scholarships. I’m beyond blessed and grateful because it’s not only about scholarship but I have a new family. I can’t thank enough for SEA Group!”

data.name: Sheinna Yendri - Institut Teknologi Sepuluh Nopember
data.story: “I first heard about Sea when I was still a freshman. Sea offers scholarships for freshmen which cover all tuition fees for 8 semester plus other additional fees. Knowing this, I immediately applied for this program and was lucky enough to be chosen as one of Sea scholars. Thanks to this program, I can join lots of competitions which sharpen my skills that revolve around technology. Moreover, being Sea scholar really motivates me to study hard and keep my GPA high. Thank you, Sea for giving me this opportunity”

data.name: Luis Indracahya - Bina Nusantara University
data.story: "On behalf of my companions, I'd like to say that it is truly an honor to be one of the scholars from SEA. Being a student at a world-class university is exceptionally challenging, yet this remarkable opportunity comes before me and aids me in a lot of ways. Thus, taking part in this occasion is rhetorically an indescribable, life-changing experience."

data.name: Zhafira Elham Fawnia - Universitas Gadjah Mada
data.story: For me, SEA Scholarship takes a huge part in my academic life, not only does the scholarship helps me pay my tuition here at UGM, but also it funds me if I ever want to go to competitions or any other academic events. Also with the bar set very high for each scholarship awardee's GPA, I am always motivated to continue learning and be the best version of myself. And this scholarship is a huge opportunity for me to have ties with such a huge corporation, I am truly thankful for this scholarship.
